title: Drawing, 1969-165-432, 1952–69
medium: Green, blue, red and pink colored pencil, graphite on white tracing paper fastened to cardboard with four staples
inscribed: Verso in graphite upper left corner: II - 14
provenance: This collection was donated to the Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum in 1969 by Alexander Girard
description: Geometric pattern of diagonal triangles arranged in a two -to-one ration reading from top to bottom. Two bands of pink across upper edge.
